Package Business.Entities

Class AI

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
Business.Entities.AI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class AI extends Thread
A class used to perform logic based functions in a game with AI opponents

    • createRandomBoard

      public void createRandomBoard(int numDestroyer, int numAircraft, int numSpeedboat, int numSubmarine)
      generates the AIs random game board
      Parameters:
      numDestroyer - the number of destroyers to be placed on the board (4 cells wide)
      numAircraft - the number of aircrafts to be placed on the board (5 cells wide)
      numSpeedboat - the number of speedboats to be placed on the board (2 cells wide)
      numSubmarine - the number of submarines to be placed on the board (3 cells wide)

    • markCell

      public void markCell(Point point, int player_shooting)
      Used to annotate that a cell in the board has been adjusted
      Parameters:

      player_shooting - the person who shot their board
